actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide that the bill H.R. 10898 to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for the United States Railway Association for fiscal year 1979, with the Senate amendments thereto, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with amendments.

summary.text: Resolves that the bill H.R. 10898 to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973, with the Senate amendments, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with an amendment.

titles.title: A resolution to provide that the bill H.R. 10898 to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for the United States Railway Association for fiscal year 1979, with the Senate amendments thereto, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with amendments.
